desc: UV and Scratch Protection as well as Ultra Hydrophobic Ceramic Coatings for Hydrofoils, Foils, Wings, Kites, Surfboards, Inflatable Paddleboards, Kayaks, Skim Boards, Wakeboards and Wakesurf Boards. Glassware coatings for added durability against scratches and breakages without changing its appearance. Non-Resin Stick.
